LanguageData.ESCP_Spriggan_EnableChopAttack: Enable hostile spriggan appearing out of chopped trees.
LanguageData.ESCP_Spriggan_EnableChopChance: The chance a hositle spriggan will appear from a chopped tree.
LanguageData.ESCP_Spriggan_EnableAttackChance: Enable spriggan attacks occurring when trees are cut.
LanguageData.ESCP_Spriggan_SownAttackChance: Cutting sown trees can trigger spriggan attacks.
LanguageData.ESCP_Spriggan_ResetAttackChance: Reset the chance of a spriggan attack whenever a spriggan attack is triggered.
LanguageData.ESCP_Spriggan_InitialAttackChance: The initial chance that a spriggan attack occurs when a tree is cut down.
LanguageData.ESCP_Spriggan_IncreasedAttackChance: The amount the chance increases every time a tree is cut.
LanguageData.ESCP_Spriggan_DecreasedAttackChance: The amount the chance decreases per in game day.
LanguageData.ESCP_Spriggan_EnableDefaultType: Enable spriggan attacks defaulting to standard spriggans for biomes without assigned spriggans.
LanguageData.ESCP_Spriggan_EnableAnimalControl: Enable wild spriggans controlling wild animals when enraged.
LanguageData.ESCP_Spriggan_EnableRegen: Enable spriggans gaining enhanced wound regeneration when their pain is high enough.
LanguageData.ESCP_Spriggan_DebugAttackChance: [DEV] Print the current attack chance in the devlog whenever the chance is modified.
LanguageData.ESCP_Spriggan_SprigganAttack_Description: Due to local deforestation, or possibly some other disturbance, local spriggan have turned manhunter, and are seeking out who they believe have defiled nature.
LanguageData.ESCP_Spriggan_SprigganChopAttack_Descrip: The felling of a tree has disturbed a nearby spriggan. It will now seek out those who dare defile nature.
LanguageData.ESCP_AnimalWandersIn_Description: A {0} has wandered into the area. You may kill it, or attempt to tame it.
LanguageData.ESCP_Spriggan_SpriganAnimalControlled: A {0} has answered an enraged spriggans call for aid.
LanguageData.ESCP_Spriggan_SpriganCreated: A new {0} has emerged from a {1}.
LanguageData.ESCP_Spriggan_SpriganCreation_Immature: {0} will begin forming once the {1} is mature
